```{r}
#| KEGG_GSEA
setwd('F:\\NC_code\\Figure4g')
gsea_KEGG_result = gseKEGG(geneList = genelist, 
                           organism = "hsa", 
                           pvalueCutoff = 1,
                           eps = 1e-20,
                           minGSSize = 5)
```

```{r}
#| Visualize the results
pdf('GSEA_KEGG_ferroptosis.pdf',width = 5,height = 5)
gseaNb(object = gsea_KEGG_result,
       geneSetID = 'hsa04216',
       addPval = T,
       curveCol = c('#76BA99'))
dev.off()
```
